currency.title: Currency Configuration
currency.description: Configure currency units, symbols, and exchange rate API settings
currency.accessKeyDescription: Free exchange rate API key provided by {url}
currency.currencySymbolDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system
currency.currencyUnitDescription: Used for display purposes only; changing this will affect all currency units in the system

invite.title: Invitation Settings
invite.description: Configure user invitation and referral reward settings
invite.forcedInviteDescription: When enabled, users must register through an invitation link
invite.referralPercentageDescription: Percentage of reward given to referrers
invite.onlyFirstPurchaseDescription: When enabled, referrers only receive rewards for the first purchase by referred users

logCleanup.title: Log Cleanup Settings
logCleanup.description: Configure automatic log cleanup rules and retention period
logCleanup.autoClearDescription: When enabled, the system will automatically clear expired log records
logCleanup.clearDaysDescription: Number of days to retain logs; logs older than this will be cleaned up

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Edit and manage privacy policy content

register.title: Registration Settings
register.stopNewUserRegistrationDescription: When enabled, new user registration will be disabled
register.ipRegistrationLimitDescription: Limit the number of registrations from a single IP address
register.registrationLimitCountDescription: Number of registrations allowed per IP within the limit period
register.enableTrialDescription: When enabled, new users will receive a trial subscription upon registration
register.trialConfigDescription: Configure trial subscription, duration and time unit for new users upon registration

site.title: Site Configuration
site.description: Configure basic site information, logo, domain and other settings
site.customHtmlDescription: Custom HTML code to be injected into the bottom of the site's body tag
site.logoDescription: Used for displaying the logo in designated locations
site.logoPlaceholder: Enter the URL of the logo, without ending with '/'
site.siteDescDescription: Used for displaying the site description in designated locations
site.siteDomainDescription: Domain address of the current website, e.g., used in emails
site.siteDomainPlaceholder: Please enter the domain address. For multiple domains, please enter one per line.
site.siteNameDescription: Used for displaying the site name in designated locations

tos.title: Terms of Service
tos.description: Edit and manage terms of service content

verify.title: Security Verification
verify.description: Configure Turnstile CAPTCHA and verification settings
verify.turnstileSiteKeyDescription: Cloudflare Turnstile site key for frontend verification
verify.turnstileSecretDescription: Cloudflare Turnstile secret key for backend verification
verify.enableRegisterVerifyDescription: When enabled, users must pass human verification during registration
verify.enableLoginVerifyDescription: When enabled, users must pass human verification during login
verify.enablePasswordVerifyDescription: When enabled, users must pass human verification during password reset

verifyCode.title: Verification Code Settings
verifyCode.description: Configure email verification code sending rules and limits
verifyCode.intervalDescription: Minimum interval between two verification code sends (seconds)
verifyCode.dailyLimitDescription: Maximum number of verification codes each user can send per day
